abstracts.cdata!:
The Third Social Find for Development
            Project - additional financing for Yemen will build on the
            success of the ongoing third phase of the SFD operations and
            will continue to support the SFD's effective delivery
            of social services using participative approaches. The focus
            will be on sustainability of activities and capacity
            building of local communities, NGOs, and select government
            agencies. The additional financing will be provided
            additional funds for the three main components : community
            development; micro- enterprise development; and Capacity
            Building and Institutional Support.
